701942f-b.text:
1841 University Avenue, west side, north of N. Tremont Avenue, showing the gate lodge to the large Hugh N. Camp estate snd driveway. It was destroyed or torn down in 1924. A six-story apartment, bearing the above street address, 'as later erected on the site when this area was built up.
E. P. Chrystie  May 30, 1923
Cnw IT LINE I5ERATIUI  Views 1,.
